welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Houghton le Spring, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newcastle Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Newcastle Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tees Valley Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tees Valley Airport is responsible for handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
